4319190.name: Frayline
4319190.description:
Frayline is a bullet hell RPG where spellcasting is not about buttons alone — it’s about drawing power into existence.

You play as a wizard descending into a cursed dungeon, fighting relentless monsters while dodging waves of deadly projectiles. Every spell you cast must be drawn, combining elements and spell forms to unleash magic in real time. Precision, creativity, and survival go hand in hand.

This is an early concept build, created to explore whether Frayline’s core ideas resonate with players.
4319190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
